metadata.title: CVE-2024-44986 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: fix possible UAF in ip6_finish_output2()If skb_expand_head() returns NULL, skb has been freedand associated dst/idev could also have been freed.We need to hold rcu_read_lock() to make sure the dst andassociated idev are alive.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
